page.title: 19RADCLIFFE - OLD AND NEW
page.content: TAKING MY PENFRIEND FOR A TOUR OF THE TOWN I WOULD FIRSTLY GO TO THE{TYTHE {BARN}- IT WAS USED TO STORE CROPS.LAND OWNERS GAVE 1/10th OF THEIR CROPS TO THE CHURCH. NEXT I WOULD GO TO MY SCHOOL,CONEY GREEN, A NEW SCHOOL BUILT ON THE REMAINS OF A RAILWAY STATION YARD - TRAIN TRACKS CAN STILL BE SEEN. ANOTHER PLACE OF INTEREST IS THE 12th CENTURY TOWER WHERE THE LORD LIVED WELL BUT THE POOR BEGGED FOR FOOD AND WORE RAGS. OTHER PLACES TO VISIT ARE THE NEW BATHS AND THE MODERN SHOPPING PRECINCT - BUT SHOPPING IS BETTER IN BURY,BOLTON AND MANCHESTER.
